Producer: Dominique Boutonnat, Hubert Caillard, Malte Grunert, Andrew Levitas, Gabrielle Tana
Production Co: Magnolia Mae Films, Baby Cow Productions, Metalwork Pictures, Amusement Park Films, Warner Bros. Film Productions Germany, Electrick Films
Synopsis: Isabelle, a single mother raising her only daughter, takes matters into her own hands after tragedy strikes.
Title: My Zoe
